name: Sweet Forest Guardian
description:
Sweet Forest Guardian－Is a card + real-time tactics game. Players have to combine their own decks to defeat the enemy, and after winning the battle, they can save their lovely elf companions.
Players can also buy cards from the goddess through the experience points gained after the battle^^



There are 30 levels in the game, and each level has three difficulties. Players can play easily or challenge themselves. Of course, the higher the difficulty, the more experience and cards they will get.
There are 100 photo cards + 9 troop cards available for collection, hurry up and save your elf companions.

In viewing mode, the mouse wheel can zoom in and out of the picture
On most pages, the "Esc" key is the previous page
Press the "Tab" key to accelerate or decelerate in the game
